p: Developed ReactJS web applications, boosting user engagement by 30% for 2,000+ users. Integrated RESTful APIs, reduced data retrieval time by 40%, and improved performance. Enhanced code quality with Jest and Enzyme, and managed version control with Git. Skilled in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, React, Redux, TypeScript, and modern front-end tools.

Developed responsive web apps using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Integrated interactivity and enhanced functionality. Collaborated with team via Git for code management. Focused on optimizing performance for speed and scalability, following best practices for efficient and maintainable code.
